description:
Pursuing Financial Justice

At The Ferraro Law Firm, P.A., we provide focused asbestos and mesothelioma representation to people in Miami, Florida, and throughout the surrounding area. When the negligence of a company or an individual causes people to fall ill or suffer injuries, our attorneys aggressively advocate, helping hold the liable parties responsible. Our law firm offers virtual appointments, and we accept credit cards for our clients' convenience.

Serving Florida For More Than 30 Years

Founded in 1985, our law firm proudly represents people and families throughout the state with mesothelioma and asbestos cases. We also aid with other personal injury and product liability claims involving matters such as the following:

  • Birth injuries
  • Medical malpractice
  • Defective drugs and medical devices
  • Brain injuries
  • Toxic torts
  • Wrongful death

In addition to our personal injury services, our attorneys provide representation for matters including business and commercial law, consumer protection, contracts, energy, environmental, family law and natural resources.

Achieving Success For Our Clients

Over the years, our attorneys at The Ferraro Law Firm, P.A., have recovered billions of dollars in settlements and judgments on behalf of our clients. Beginning with free initial consultations, we talk to our clients about their illnesses or injuries, gaining an understanding of their circumstances and how their conditions have affected their lives. Offering compassionate yet tenacious representation, we tirelessly pursue the maximum compensation on behalf of our clients.
